members.name: Priya Mehta
members.bio: Specializing in postcolonial literature with a focus on diasporic narratives. Currently exploring the intersection of magical realism and contemporary South Asian storytelling, while leading the club's initiatives in promoting diverse literary voices.
achievements: Published 'Voices from the Margin' in University Literary Review
Presented at Regional Literary Theory Conference 2023

favoriteQuote.text: In our village, folks say God crumbles up the old moon into stars.

members.name: Marcus Chen
members.bio: Experimental poet merging Eastern philosophical traditions with contemporary verse forms. Advocates for interdisciplinary approaches to poetry, incorporating elements of visual arts and digital media.

favoriteQuote.text: Poetry is not a turning loose of emotion, but an escape from emotion.
favoriteQuote.author: T.S. Eliot

events.title: Modernist Poetry Workshop: Breaking Traditional Forms
events.description: Immerse yourself in the art of experimental verse. Under the guidance of award-winning poet Dr. Sarah Mitchell, explore how to transcend conventional poetic structures while maintaining artistic integrity.

topics: Voice and Authenticity in Modern Poetry
learningOutcomes: Master the principles of modern poetic forms
Create a portfolio of experimental works
details.callToAction: Hone your verse-crafting prowess in this transformative workshop
